# [TrovaJob ](https://dazzling-bhaskara-132f82.netlify.app)

## Finding your Job it's our Job

![](data:image/png;base64,)

- **version: 0.0.3**
  ![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/joemccann/dillinger.svg?branch=master)

## It Allow :

- **users to :**
  -- explore the job requirements in their nearby areas
  -- seek for jobs
  -- load their ( Cv's, diploms, images... ) to their profiles  
  -- connect in private chats with companies
- **companies to :**
  -- offer jobs
  -- seek for specific job posts
  -- manage their offerts
  -- customize offerts
  -- private chats with job seekers

- **Admin to:**
  -- full manage of the app users of type user
  -- full manage of the app users of type company
  -- unlock new places to accept offering job in it
  -- private chats with all type of users ( for warnings, communications, mails... )
  -- update, delete and ristrict data ( users, profiles, job-offerts, cities, places...)

> for clarifications purposes and more understandability of the app features
> I have made available a demo of the admin model ( you find credentials on the credentials table below )  
> which can apply and show the admin functionalities
> excluding those who interact with the database
> or who can make damage to the application functionalities

## Tech

**TrovaJob it's a web app generated and developed by:**

- [Angular] : to mange the front-end part
- [Angular Material] : to give a best ui together with a great ux
- [Ngrx-data] : to mange the state following the redux pattern
- [Firebase] : to store and save the data, manage authentication and notification pushes
- [Node.js] : to manage the back end part
- [express] : for design and build the back-end node application quickly and easily.

## Credentials table

Instructions on how to use them in your own application are linked below.

| User type | email              | password   |
| --------- | ------------------ | ---------- |
| admin     | admin@testme.com   | admin123   |
| user      | user@testme.com    | user123    |
| company   | company@testme.com | company123 |

[angular]: https://angular.io/
[angular material]: https://material.angular.io/
[firebase]: https://firebase.google.com/
[node.js]: https://nodejs.org/en/
[ngrx-data]: https://ngrx.io/guide/data
[express]: http://expressjs.com
